properties.body:
ARCTIC.
THE U.S. AND CANADIAN COAST GUARDS WILL
COMMENCE TERMINATING THE TRANSMISSION OF
ALL REMAINING LORAN-C SIGNALS 03 AUG OR SOON
AFTER. LORAN-C SHOULD NO LONGER BE RELIED
UPON FOR NAVIGATION AFTER THIS DATE.
FOR MORE INFORMATION CONSULT THE WEB
AT WWW.NOTMAR.GC.CA AND WWW.USCG.GOV FOR
UPDATES.
